languages.text: After an ally takes an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} provided by the character, the ally gains +7% armour, +7% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.
languages.original_text: Союзник, которому персонаж предоставляет {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, получает +7% к броне, +7% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очка передвижения{/g} до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: After taking an extra turn provided by the character, an ally gains +10% armour, +10% dodge, and +3 movement points until the end of combat. Does not stack.
After an ally takes an extra turn provided by the character, the ally gains +10% armour, +10% dodge, and +3 movement points until the end of combat. Does not stack.

After an ally takes an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} provided by the character, the ally gains +7% armour, +7% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

After an ally takes an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} provided by the character, the ally gains +7% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, +7% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}, and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

After an ally takes an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} provided by the character, the ally gains +7% armour, +7% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

languages.text: Cuando un aliado recibe un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} proporcionado por el personaje, el aliado gana +7 % de armadura, +7 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: After an ally takes an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} provided by the character, the ally gains +7% armour, +7% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un aliado recibe un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} proporcionado por el personaje, el aliado gana +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}, +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text: 味方がこのキャラクターによって{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を与えられた後、その味方は戦闘終了までアーマー+7%、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}+7%、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}+3を得る。この効果はスタックしない。
languages.original_text: After an ally takes an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} provided by the character, the ally gains +7% armour, +7% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 味方がこのキャラクターによって{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を与えられた後、その味方は戦闘終了までアーマー+7%、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}+7%、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}+3を得る。この効果はスタックしない。

味方がこのキャラクターによって{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を与えられた後、その味方は戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}+7%、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}+7%、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}+3を得る。この効果は累積しない。

languages.text: 当此角色为盟友提供{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}之后，该盟友获得+7%护甲、+7%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与+3{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果不可叠加。
languages.original_text: After an ally takes an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} provided by the character, the ally gains +7% armour, +7% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 当此角色为盟友提供{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}之后，该盟友获得+10%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}、+10%{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}与+3{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果不可叠加。

当此角色为盟友提供{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}之后，该盟友获得+7%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}、+7%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与+3{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果不可叠加。

languages.text: Hat ein Verbündeter einen vom Charakter erhaltenen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} absolviert, erhält der Verbündete bis zum Ende des Kampfes +7 % Rüstung, +7 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g}. Nicht stapelbar.
languages.original_text: After an ally takes an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} provided by the character, the ally gains +7% armour, +7% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem ein Verbündeter eine vom Charakter erhaltene {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Extra-Runde{/g} absolviert hat, erhält der Verbündete bis zum Ende des Kampfes +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}, +10% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} und +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g}. Wird nicht aufaddiert.

languages.text: Après avoir effectué un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} conféré par le personnage, un allié bénéficie de +7 % d'armure, +7 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Non cumulable.
languages.original_text: After an ally takes an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} provided by the character, the ally gains +7% armour, +7% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir effectué un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} conféré par le personnage, un allié bénéficie de +10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}, +10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. languages.text: Bir dost birim, karakter tarafından sağlanan bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandığında zırhı +%7, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değeri +%7 ve {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanları{/g} da +3 artar. Bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.
